ComicInfo.Penciller: Herb Trimpe,John Romita,Marie Severin,Herb Trimpe,Marie Severin
ComicInfo.Summary: Ten Rings Hath... the Mandarin!: Just as Yuri and his men are about to decimate the Hulk, Nick Fury shows up to take his Russian foe down. The Mandarin zaps the Hulk to his compound and puts him through his paces to see if the jade giant would make a worthy ally in his bid to take over the world.
